msbt.message: Looks like Gulliver is zonked out on the beach again. As usual!I went over to wake him up, but all I got was a few seconds of sleep-talk before he was out again.Think you could do better, ? I bet he's still down on the beach.

You hear about the gig K.K.'s doing today? He's even gonna be takin' requests later tonight, .I am so hyped to hear him groove! As soon as that sound hits my ears, my problems just melt away. Can't wait!
I ran into Label earlier. She was hanging out by Resident Services.She kinda stresses me out. It's like she's always judging my fashion sense, except I don't have any!
I saw Saharah hanging out a little while ago. She's got some sweet new rugs for sale, !I don't know if it's her sales pitch or all the rad rug patternsbut I spend WAY too much when she's around.
You see the concert happening in the plaza? K.K.'s in da house! Oron da island, !I'm about to head over. I am NOT gonna pass up a chance to hear him play. He's even takin' requests!

Daisy Mae's here! Daisy Mae's here! She's over by, um Well, she's around. You know how she is.Her veggies are so crazy-tasty! I have no idea how she does it, but they're always the mm-mm best!I guess her grandma passed down a trick or two. She's totally got the gift, !
I saw this real creaky-lookin' boat anchored up north. Know anything about it, ?It's got me seriously tensed up, like we're about to be invaded by a bunch of evil pirates or something.

I got this weird feeling earlier, like a lukewarm wind whooshing through me. It waskinda refreshing, really. You don't think it was a g-gghost, do you? I mean, if it was, it seemed like a happy ghost. But still, creepy!
Hey! You stop by the plaza yet? You should! K.K.'s doing a bigoops! Um, he's doing something cool.Anyway, you should go. Today! Justyou gotta trust me on this, . Go! Go! Go! Shoo!

You been to the plaza? You're not gonna believe it, but K.K.'s doing a show there right this second!He made a special trip out here for someone's birthday. How amazingly awesome is that?!Whoever's birthday it is, I gotta thank 'em! Now we ALL get to rock out, !
Hey! Did you see that Mabel's around? Have you talked to her yet, ?It's tough to find decent threads out here sometimes, but Mabel's got the hook-up!
C.J.'s around if you wanna off-load some fish. Just follow your nose. That fish smell REALLY carries
You hung out with Flick yet? He's a blast, ! Total rocker. My kind of guy.Anyway, he's here buyin' up bugs if you've got any you wanna get rid of.
I saw Kicks hang out in the plaza a little bit ago. He's looking real sharp today, ? It's too bad I'm not a shoe-wearin' kinda gal. Maybe I could ask him to find me a new bag, though

Hey, I noticed Celeste was getting set up to check out the stars.You ever wonder if she spots anything different based on where she's lookin' from?It's just amazing to me Stars so ridiculously far away. It's wild that we know ANYTHING about 'em!Hmm I oughta pick her brain on this stuff someday, .

OK, I gotta get something off my chest. And trust me, I know how this is gonna sound, sohere goes.There's something out there.I keep catching, like, glimpses and peeks ofI don't know what. It's like a big, yellow, hoppingthing.Everyone keeps saying I've just been watchin' too many scary moviesand OK, yeah. But I still know what I saw!It's out there, whatever it is. I just hope it hurries and shows itself so we can get to the good part!
Leif's down in the plaza. There's something about that guy that just puts me at ease.It's not just 'cause he sells flowers either. He's just so incredibly chill and friendly, .

Did I miss a costume party? There's someone in a sweet-lookin' pirate outfit all zonked out on the beach.I can't figure it out, but he looks really familiar. LikeREALLY familiar, . It's driving me nuts!Well, a good nap is a beautiful thing, and I'm not about to wreck that.<10_4 /> But maybe you should! Bwa ha ha!
I saw a new face on the island earlier, but they wandered off before I could talk to 'em.So yeah, there's a newcomer out there somewhere. If you spot 'em, go say hi!
